name: Alice Wonderland

experience.title: Software Engineer

resume_text:
Alice Wonderland - alice.w@example.com

Summary: Experienced Python developer with 6 years in web application development, specializing in Django and Flask frameworks. Proficient in full-stack development, including API design, database management, and cloud deployment on AWS.

Experience:
Software Engineer, Tech Solutions Inc. (4 years)
- Developed and maintained web applications using Python and Django.
- Worked on API development and database management.

Junior Developer, Web Wizards LLC (2 years)
- Assisted in frontend and backend development tasks.
- Gained experience with Flask and basic cloud deployment.

Skills: Python, Django, Flask, REST APIs, SQL, NoSQL, Git, Docker, AWS, Microservices (basic understanding).
